overview: In Spring 2014, Coldplay returned with their sixth studio album 'Ghost Stories'. The band unveiled the album to a small handful of fans via an intimate, world-premiere performance at Sony Studios, L.A. This ground-breaking production was performed in the round with jaw-dropping 360-degree and overhead imagery. Director Paul Dugdale explored worlds-within-worlds, blending live performance with cinematic film.
title: Coldplay: Ghost Stories
